com.brightcove.player.view
Class BrightcovePlayer

java.lang.Object
  android.content.Context
      android.content.ContextWrapper
          android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
              android.app.Activity
                  com.brightcove.player.view.BrightcovePlayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback
public class BrightcovePlayer
extends android.app.Activity

An Activity with basic life cycle and full screen support. The onCreate() should be extended to wire up the activity's layout to the brightcoveVideoView instance variable. For example: brightcoveVideoView = (BrightcoveVideoView) findViewById(R.id.brightcove_video_view);
